analysis.Summary: Vue 3 component that renders a circular minus icon as an SVG with a customizable stroke color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, parameterizable ‘minus’ icon for navigation or UI actions throughout the application.

Components.name: IconMinus
Components.role: Renders an SVG containing a horizontal line and enclosing circle; exposes a `fill` prop to control the stroke color.

parameters.name: fill
parameters.description: Stroke color for the SVG path

analysis.Usage: Import with `import IconMinus from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconMinus.vue'` and use in templates as `<IconMinus fill="red" />` or omit `fill` to use default.
Notes: No `<style>` block; visual appearance relies entirely on SVG attributes and the passed `fill` prop.
SVG markup includes both the minus line (`M15.6078 26.1143H36.3946`) and the circular border path.
Uses fixed `width`/`height` of 52px but can be scaled via parent CSS or wrapping `<svg>` attributes if needed.
Leverages Vue 3 `<script setup>` syntax for minimal boilerplate.
